doc:
Geoffrey Deuel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geoffrey_Deuel 0 Geoffrey Jacob Deuel (born January 17, 1943) is an American actor. Deuel is best known for playing Billy the Kid in the movie Chisum (1970). He has been in several movie and television productions through the years including The Mod Squad, Ironside, and The Name of the Game. He was the brother of Pete Duel, who starred in Love on a Rooftop and Alias Smith and Jones. Geoffrey_Jacob_Deuel ( born January_17_,_1943 ) is an_American_actor . Deuel is_best_known for playing Billy the_Kid in the_movie_Chisum_(_1970_) . He has_been in several_movie_and_television_productions through the_years including The_Mod_Squad , Ironside , and The_Name of the_Game . He was the_brother of Pete_Duel , who starred in Love on a_Rooftop_and_Alias_Smith and Jones .
